comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180912
usage: "OCR_xxx:prefix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx:suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped

params.channel: which channel to take for multi-channel data; either an integer or 'avg', or 'rgb' (avg)

Detector.prefix: text in box starts with this and this should be stripped
Detector.type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type

Integral.suffix: text in box ends with this and this should be stripped
Integral.type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type

Label.type: result should be interpreted as variable of this type

params.slicenr: which slice to analyse if enhanced dicom is used (-1)
